text: Jay Adams (February 3, 1961 – August 14, 2014) was an American skateboarder. He became known as one of the original members of Z-Boys skateboarding team. He was known as "The Original Seed" of the sport. He was thought to be one of the most influential skateboarders of all time. Adams died from a massive heart attack in Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca, Mexico, aged 53. ==References== ==Other websites== *DOGTOWN-The Legend of the Z-Boys, C.R. Stecyk III & Glen E. Friedman, Burning Flags Press, 2000, *JAY-BOY – Classic photographs by Jay Adams stepfather, Kent Sherwood, Concrete Wave Editions, 2006, * *Scarred for Life – Eleven Stories About Skateboarders by Keith Hamm, Chronicle Books, 2004, Category:1961 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American skateboarders Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles
title: Jay Adams
